sentences.sContent: If the effulgence of a thousand suns simultaneously were to blaze forth in the firmament ;
sentences.sContent_eng: If the effulgence of a thousand suns simultaneously were to blaze forth in the firmament ;
sentences.sCn: 假如天空中有一千个太阳同时放射光芒，或许才可以和至尊人格神宇宙形象的辉煌灿烂相媲美。

sentences.sContent: With that word "death" the heat seemed to increase till it became a threatening weight and the lagoon attacked them with a blinding effulgence.
sentences.sContent_eng: With that word "death" the heat seemed to increase till it became a threatening weight and the lagoon attacked them with a blinding effulgence.
sentences.sCn: 随着这个“死”字， 暑热仿佛越来越厉害，热得逼人。环礁湖也以令人目眩的灿烂袭击着他们。

sentences.sContent: And this ten-thousand fold cosmos shivered & quivered & quaked, while a great, measureless radiance appeared in the cosmos, surpassing the effulgence of the devas.
sentences.sContent_eng: And this ten-thousand fold cosmos shivered & quivered & quaked, while a great, measureless radiance appeared in the cosmos, surpassing the effulgence of the devas.
sentences.sCn: 此十千宇宙在抖动、颤动、震动，一道大无量光出现在宇宙间，胜于天神的灿烂。
